tool.name: Flight curve
tool.description: compute the regional expected pattern of abundance

param.name: input
param.label: Count file
param.help: The file must contain the SPECIES, SITE, YEAR, MONTH, DAY and COUNT columns. CSV file separator ',' or tab.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Regional phenology ==========================
This tool is an implementation of the flight_curve function RegionalGAM package: https://github.com/RetoSchmucki/regionalGAM/ This function computes the annual phenology on a specific region.
